com.inqwell.any.channel

Class Socket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inqwell.any.AbstractAny
      • com.inqwell.any.channel.Socket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Any, ChannelDriver, Serializable

    public class Socket
extends AbstractAny
implements ChannelDriver
    A channel driver that uses an InputStream and OutputStream based on a Socket to transfer Any structures. Currently only ObjectInput/OutputStreams are supported. This channel driver implementation also manages the socket from which the streams were derived.

    The channel may support either or both of read/write depending on what streams are supplied. If unavailable a method throws an UnsupportedOperationException.

    NOTE: Although the socket driver can be created to support bi-directional I/O it should not be placed inside a single AnyChannel instance on which concurrent reads and writes will be performed, or deadlock across the channel will occur.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getTotalIn

        public long getTotalIn()
        Return the total number of bytes sent so far on this channel driver before compressing. Only relevant when the underlying output stream supports compression and is operating in compressed mode.
        Returns:
        the total number of uncompressed bytes sent or -1 if not setup for output or not compressing.

      • getTotalOut

        public long getTotalOut()
        Return the total number of bytes sent so far on this channel after compressing. Only relevant when the underlying output stream supports compression and is operating in compressed mode.
        Returns:
        the total number of compressed bytes sent or -1 if not setup for output or not compressing.

      • clone

        public Object clone()
        Define cloning. In fact, this class is immutable and therefore cloning is not relevant and we just return this. Cloning must be defined, however, as these objects may be transmitted through local channels, which are at liberty to clone what they transport, if they so wish.
        Overrides:
        clone in class Object
